physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient's prolactin (PRL) and IGF-I levels were markedly elevated. An invasive macroadenoma with erosion of the sella floor and compression of the optic chiasm was noted.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The tumor increased in size despite treatment with bromocriptine, and complete excision was not achieved due to extensive invasion of the left cavernous sinus.
